attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the under signed petition the 1963 incapacity system. The 1997 amendment means that no one has any right of appeal. This cannot be right Only the Governments amendment counts it,s one sided we MUST HAVE A RIGHT.

rejection.details: The title must be a specific call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
